amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove the scope and economic loss language from the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 8 printed in House Report 114-389 to strike the "scope" and "economic loss" language from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 223, 1 Present (Roll no. 29).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 223, 1 Present (Roll no. 29).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
